name: Fluffriends
description:
You are a fluffy character that loves to watch the stars... but achieving such a task is no always easy... sometimes you need help from your fluffriends!

Move the hands of these fluffy individuals, extend or squeeze their arms in order to help others achieve their goal.

Game made by Nico Recabarren with Audio by Vale Moretti.

The hummed song used in the background is based on "Nothing's gonna stop us now" by Starship.

Game made for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021
